name: part_009
file: tmp_【THE DEVIL WEARS HOPE 3D LIVE】 IRyS Anniversary LIVE #DevilWearsHope [RQn7biOiqHs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Yuki no Hana' concludes as IRyS sings the final lines.
MC section where IRyS thanks the audience, discusses the medley, and introduces the next guest performance.
IRyS performs 'Tsumi no Namae' with members of Hololive Council.

subtitles.original: 想い出を描くよ
subtitles.english: I'll paint our memories

subtitles.original: これからもずっと...
subtitles.english: From now on, and forever...

subtitles.original: And that was Yuki no Hana.
subtitles.english: And that was Yuki no Hana.

subtitles.original:
Did you guys like the ballad and the gondola
riding all the way here?
subtitles.english:
Did you guys like the ballad and the gondola
riding all the way here?

subtitles.original: Yes, it was a pretty flower...
subtitles.english: Yes, it was a pretty flower...

subtitles.original: ...flower snowflake, yes, that I rode on all the way here.
subtitles.english: ...flower snowflake, yes, that I rode on all the way here.

subtitles.original: And did you guys like the guest part? Yeah!
subtitles.english: And did you guys like the guest part? Yeah!

subtitles.original:
I sang a lot of songs with the guests and a full on
medley that I put a lot of thought into.
subtitles.english:
I sang a lot of songs with the guests and a full on
medley that I put a lot of thought into.

subtitles.original:
I really want to talk more about the medley and
the concept but I think I won't have enough time for that.
subtitles.english:
I really want to talk more about the medley and
the concept but I think I won't have enough time for that.

subtitles.original: Maybe I'll talk about that in a future stream.
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll talk about that in a future stream.

subtitles.original:
And also thank you so much for my lovely
guests for singing with me.
subtitles.english:
And also thank you so much for my lovely
guests for singing with me.

subtitles.original:
But there's still one more guest song! Yeah! And
that's not the last song by the way, so no worries.
subtitles.english:
But there's still one more guest song! Yeah! And
that's not the last song by the way, so no worries.

subtitles.original:
There's going to be one more guest song that
you guys are absolutely gonna love!
subtitles.english:
There's going to be one more guest song that
you guys are absolutely gonna love!

subtitles.original: And also, also!
subtitles.english: And also, also!

subtitles.original:
There's going to be one super exciting announcement
that I've been waiting super waiting to show you guys.
subtitles.english:
There's going to be one super exciting announcement
that I've been waiting super waiting to show you guys.

subtitles.original: So please do look forward to that as well.
subtitles.english: So please do look forward to that as well.

subtitles.original: なんとね、雪の華とあとゲストパートどうでしたか？
subtitles.english: So, how did you like Yuki no Hana and the guest part?

subtitles.original: いや、あのメドレーとかね、すごく、とてもあのもう色々考えた上で企画したんで、
subtitles.english: I put a lot of thought into planning that medley and everything,

subtitles.original: もう本当にね、色々自分の考えたこととかも全部言いたいんですけど、ちょっとそこまで時間ないので、
subtitles.english: I really want to tell you all about my ideas, but I don't quite have the time for that here,

subtitles.original: とにかくね、みんな気に入っていただけるととても嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: Anyway, I'd be very happy if you all enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: そしてね、あの素敵な先輩方と一緒に歌えてとっても嬉しかったです。
subtitles.english: And I was so happy to sing with those wonderful senpais.

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとうございました、先輩方。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, senpais.

subtitles.original: そして、えっと、まだね、ゲストパートというかあとゲスト曲まだ一曲あるんで、
subtitles.english: And, well, there's still one more guest part—actually, one more guest song—

subtitles.original: これから歌いますんでね、みんな最後まで見てください。
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing it now, so please stay with me until the end.

subtitles.original: あとね、そのすぐあとにね、もうひとつとっても素敵な、嬉しい、
subtitles.english: And right after that, there's another very wonderful, happy announcement...

subtitles.original: ずっと待ち遠しかった告知とお披露目があるんで、みんな最後まで見てくださいね。
subtitles.english: ...and reveal that I've been looking forward to for ages, so please watch until the very end.

subtitles.original: では、次の曲行きます。Please listen to the next song.
subtitles.english: Now, on to the next song. Please listen to the next song.

subtitles.original: 罪の名前
subtitles.english: Crime of Name

subtitles.original: Lyrics, Music: ryo (supercell)
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Music: ryo (supercell)

subtitles.original: お目目の女神様が目を留めた
subtitles.english: A goddess with eyes caught sight

subtitles.original: なんて可愛い赤ん坊だろう
subtitles.english: What a cute baby

subtitles.original: そうだわ あの子に魔法をかけて 遊びましょう
subtitles.english: I know, let's put a spell on that child and play

subtitles.original: くぼんだ両目 痩せ過ぎな体
subtitles.english: Sunken eyes, a skeletal body

subtitles.original: 私を見れば 誰しもが言うのです
subtitles.english: Anyone who looks at me says

subtitles.original: 化け物 お前は 同じ人間じゃないんだよと
subtitles.english: "Monster, you're not a human like the rest of us."

subtitles.original: 悲しいなんて思わない だって
subtitles.english: I don't think it's sad, because

subtitles.original: 思えば ほら また 涙があふれて 震える
subtitles.english: When I think about it, look, tears overflow and I tremble

subtitles.original: もしも願いが一つ叶うなら
subtitles.english: If I could have one wish come true

subtitles.original: 世界でたった一人だけの友達を
subtitles.english: I'd want just one friend in the whole world

subtitles.original: 生きることは素晴らしいこと
subtitles.english: That living is a wonderful thing

subtitles.original: そんな風に私も思ってみたい
subtitles.english: I want to be able to think that way too
